name: Frigidaire
0:
”Alexa, turn on the air conditioner”
”Alexa, set the air conditioner to 64 degrees”
”Alexa, decrease the air conditioner temperature by 2 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hands-free voice control of your connected Frigidaire appliances. 

Ask Alexa to start, stop or change a setting and it’s taken care of. 

You can use the name of the appliance, shown in your Frigidaire or Alexa app, to say what you want to control.

This skill does not support all controls, or appliances, in the Frigidaire app. If you have any questions or comments, please contact Frigidaire customer support.
To get started, go to the Alexa app and enable the Frigidaire skill.

Supported devices:
Air conditioner
Dehumidifier
Fridge

Contact us: voice@electrolux.com
